mcq.statement: What does the idiom 'fair-weather friends' refer to?

options.b: Friends who are reliable in difficult times
options.c: Friends who are only supportive when it's convenient for them
options.d: Friends who always bring good news

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'fair-weather friends' refers to people who are supportive and friendly only when it is easy and convenient for them, not in times of trouble.
